maps/heat/path-00.json/entities/298/sett.orig: Good thing we found this spot. Why is it so hot?
maps/heat/path-00.json/entities/298/sett.text: C'est bien qu'on ait trouvé ce coin. Pourquoi il fait si chaud ici ?

maps/heat/path-00.json/entities/298/sett.orig: Yeah! First freezing cold and now this?
maps/heat/path-00.json/entities/298/sett.text: Ouais ! D'abord un froid glacial et maintenant cette chaleur !

maps/heat/path-00.json/entities/298/sett.orig: I don't know what you guys are talking about. I like the hot weather here.
maps/heat/path-00.json/entities/298/sett.text: Je sais pas ce que vous avez, les mecs. J'aime bien ce temps chaud moi.

maps/heat/path-00.json/entities/298/sett.orig: You probably turned down your temperature sensitivity.
maps/heat/path-00.json/entities/298/sett.text: Tu as probablement réduit ta sensibilité à la température.

maps/heat/path-00.json/entities/298/sett.orig: Nope, I just really like the heat.
maps/heat/path-00.json/entities/298/sett.text: Non, c'est juste que j'aime bien la chaleur.

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: en_US
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: fr_FR

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: en_US
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: fr_FR

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: en_US
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: fr_FR

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: en_US
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: fr_FR

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig:
\i[arrow-w] Road to \v[area.heat-village.name]
\i[arrow-e] Railway to \v[area.bergen.name]
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text:
\i[arrow-w] Route vers \v[area.heat-village.name]
\i[arrow-e] Rails vers le \v[area.bergen.name]

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: We finally made it!
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: On a enfin réussi !

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: And after the freezing cold in \v[area.bergen.name] the heat is very welcome.
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Et après le froid glacial du \v[area.bergen.name], cette chaleur ici est bienvenue.

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: Well that's easy for you to say. I'm already sweating...
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Facile à dire pour toi. Je transpire déjà...

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: Oh come on, you could just turn off the simulation of heat.
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Oh, aller, tu peux juste désactiver la simulation de la chaleur.

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: But I don't want to break the immersion...
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Mais je ne veux pas casser l'immersion...

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: But this is just... too hot. I might have to.
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Mais il fait juste... trop chaud. Peut-être qu'il faudrait.

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: Think about it, if we could make such a device...
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Pense un peu, si on pouvait faire un de ces appareils...

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: We would need to canvas all areas and distribute them to the Seekers.
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Il faudrait cartographier toutes les zones, et les distribuer aux \v[lore.title.seeker]s.

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: Let's bring this up when we meet the boss later.
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Il faudrait en parler au boss quand on le reverra.

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: Sure, why not?
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Bien sûr, pourquoi pas ?

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: Oh hey, Stranger.
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Oh, hé, étranger.

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: Hi!
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Salut !

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: Your first time here?
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: C'est ta première fois ici ?

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: [nods]
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: Hehe, me too!
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Héhé, moi aussi !

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: I'm pretty glad that we get a breather after the \c[3]Temple Mine\c[0].
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Je suis content de pouvoir respirer un peu après le \c[3]\v[area.cold-dng.name]\c[0].

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: But I can already see new enemies beyond this ravine.
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Mais j'aperçois déjà des nouveaux ennemis de l'autre côté du ravin.

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: I just hope they act as cute as they look.
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: J'espère qu'ils sont aussi mignons qu'ils en ont l'air.

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: Hello, Human! You look puzzled!
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Bonjour, Humain ! Vous avoir l'air perdu !

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: You entered \c[3]Maroon Valley\c[0], hot-sandy desert and home of us \c[3]Shad\c[0]!
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Vous être entré dans \c[3]\v[area.heat-area.name]\c[0], désert de sable chaud et maison à nous les \c[3]Shads\c[0] !

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: All humans welcome!
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Tous humains bienvenus !

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: You should visit \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0], bustling town of Shad!
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Vous devoir visiter \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0], ville active des Shads !

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: Has big bazaar with great offers!
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Avoir grand bazar avec bonnes affaires !

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: Human want to know more? Talk to me!
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Humain veut en savoir plus ? Parler à moi !

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: Bonjour, Lea!
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Bonjour, Lea !

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: Hi!
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Salut !

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: Say... are you currently free?
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Dis... tu es libre en ce moment ?

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: I'd really like to join your party right now...\. if you are okay with that.
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: J'aimerais bien rejoindre ton groupe là maintenant...\. Si ça ne te dérange pas.

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: [nods]
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: Très bien!\. Did you just enter Maroon Valley by any chance?
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Très bien !\. Tu viendrais pas d'entrer dans la \v[area.heat-area.name] par hasard ?

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: [nods]
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: Okay, I'll be there in a second!
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: OK, j'arrive dans une seconde !

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: Thanks for waiting...
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Merci d'avoir attendu...

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: Did that birdman over there talk to you as well?
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Est-ce que ce type-oiseau là-bas t'a parlé aussi ?

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: [nods]
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: He does that with any new player that stands around for too long, non?
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Il fait ça avec tous les nouveaux joueurs qui restent trop longtemps, non ?

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: I was surprised to meet a non-human race after all!
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: J'étais surpris de voir une race non-humaine au début !

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: Anyway, we should head to \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0], right? Sounds like the next big town.
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: En tout cas, il faut qu'on aille vers \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0], c'est ça ? On dirait que c'est la prochaine grande ville.

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: [nods]
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: Well then... off we go!
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Bon alors... Allons-y !

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: Travel to \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0] together with Emilie.
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Voyagez à \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0] avec Emilie.

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: Human, want to know way to \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0]?
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Humain, toi vouloir connaitre chemin vers \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0] ?

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: [nods]
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: Easy! Human just follow this way to \c[3]west\c[0].
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Facile ! Humain suivre cette route vers l'\c[3]ouest\c[0].

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: You shortly need to turn \c[3]south\c[0], then go \c[3]west\c[0] again and follow way below \c[3]arcs of rock\c[0]!
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Puis toi devoir aller au \c[3]sud\c[0], puis encore \c[3]ouest\c[0] et suivre chemin sous \c[3]arches de pierre\c[0] !

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: You then need to turn \c[3]north\c[0] to reach deep abyss. Use rocks to jump over it.
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Puis toi devoir aller \c[3]nord\c[0], pour atteindre profonde abysse. Utiliser rochers pour sauter par-dessus.

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: Afterwards you need to turn \c[3]west\c[0] again and you will reach \c[3]Great Scar\c[0]. Amazing view to \c[3]Hourglass Building\c[0].
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Ensuite toi devoir tourner encore vers \c[3]ouest\c[0] et vous atteindre \c[3]Grande Cicatrice\c[0]. Vue magnifique sur \c[3]Bâtiment Sablier\c[0].

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: Human continue \c[3]west\c[0] and will soon reach \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0]!
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Humain continuer \c[3]ouest\c[0] et bientôt arriver à \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0] !

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: Human look confused! No problem, \c[3]just follow signposts\c[0].
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Humain avoir l'air confus ! Pas problème, \c[3]juste suivre panneaux\c[0].

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: They will point way to Ba'kii Kum!
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: Eux pointer vers Ba'kii Kum !

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: [shakes head]
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: Okay! I'm here if human has question!
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: OK ! Moi être là si humain avoir question !

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: [yes]
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: [oui]

maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.orig: [no]
maps/heat/path-01-entrance.json/entities.text: [non]
